text: Previously, on Grey's Anatomy...

I think about you a lot, and I'm telling you, I am in.

Amelia, you...

Perfect.

Because I know.
I know what I want.

Just pull it together.
So, you weren't into the idea of her being a surgeon at first?

I was trying to take care of you!

Oh, God!

And when you have a child,
